title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Go CLI and server that downloads, builds, and serves Llama-2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a simple REST/HTTP API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client/SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, push, list, delete models from any Python script or notebook.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration that wraps Ollama as an LLM, embeddings and retriever component.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; markdown, code-highlighting, model switching, multi-user, Docker ready.

title: ollama-chroma
summary: Lightweight plugin that adds Chroma vector-store support to Ollama for RAG workflows.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, conversation history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Tauri desktop app (Rust+React) that wraps Ollama into a native window with tray support.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot chat requests to a local Ollama model.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and Maven Central distribution.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and managing models through Ollama.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Next.js starter template that creates a shareable chatbot UI backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama server on Kubernetes with GPU node selector.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that adds /ask and /model slash commands powered by local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using Socket-mode to answer questions with Ollama without exposing public endpoints.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a "Generate with Ollama" command for summarizing notes or continuing writing.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal reference implementation of retrieval-augmented generation using Ollama embeddings and LLM.

title: ollama-experiments
summary: Official repo collecting community notebooks and experiments: fine-tuning, LoRA, multimodal, etc.
